response.job_title: Process Engineer | Oil & Gas | Process Safety | +5 years of experience | Interested in energy transition
response.summary:
Chemical Engineer studying a master's degree in Process and Product Design at Universidad de Los Andes. Bilingual professional with strong knowledgments in process simulation, process safety and facilities / equipment sizing. Highly interested in process safety, renewable energies and energy transition. Five years of experience as a Process Engineer in Oil & Gas industry, it is remarkable the aptitude for problem analysis, adaptation to changes and use of technical software.

The most important achievement are the creation of Process Safety team and being an junior auditor for Oil & Gas / Infrastructure projects. In addition, it is significant the ability to public speaking, productivity, curiosity and fast learning.
response.skills: Ingeniería de seguridad de procesos, Análisis de riesgos, Petróleo y gas natural, Aspen HYSYS, Ingeniería de procesos

profile_positions.description:
Responsabilities:
•	Member of Process Safety team, risk analysis leader (What If methodology), participation in HAZOP, HAZID, LOPA and Bow Tie. 
•	Design of engineering projects (Conceptual, Basic and Detailed phases) for Oil & Gas industry, develop hydraulic concepts, equipment and protection devices sizing, process simulation, critic equipment analysis, diagrams (BFD, PFD, P&ID, Logic Sequence) and Operations Philosophy. 
•	Junior Internal Auditor in Oil & Gas and Infrastructure projects. 

Achievements: 
•	Creation of Process Safety team with 6 coworkers in order to support projects and optimize execution time of risk analysys.
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Responsabilities:
•	Sales support in equipment, chemical and biochemical products for Pharmaceutical, Food, Oil &Gas Industry.

Achievements:
•	Obtain a contract to supply laboratory materials, instruments and equipments at Universidad de Cundinamarca.
profile_positions.title: Sales advisor

profile_positions.description:
Responsabilities: 
•	Research about how optimize the fermentation process to obtain PHA Biopolymer in pilot scale.

Achievements: 
•	Participation in Colombian Polymer Conference (2017) with an investigation poster titled "Polyhydroxyalkanoates (PHA): extraction, purification and mixing with plasticizers for the production of biodegradable packaging"
profile_positions.title: Intern and Process Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Responsabilities: 
• Organize activities for first semester students and support other activities as grade promotion ceremony for undergraduates and postgraduates. 

Achievements:
• Develop leadership, public speaking and organization of activities for 300 - 500 students.
profile_positions.title: Part time student worker

education.degree_name: Magister en Diseño de Procesos y Productos

company.name: HMV Ingenieros
company.description:
Somos una empresa de soluciones de ingeniería y tecnología que brinda servicios de consultoría, interventoría o supervisión y gerencia de proyectos para múltiples sectores.

Contamos con un grupo capaz de aportar al desarrollo de sociedades y países dando el primer paso en la  prestación de soluciones integrales en: consultoría e ingeniería, construcción de proyectos de energía eléctrica y soluciones  tecnológicas.

Operamos en el continente americano: en Colombia, Perú, Chile, Brasil, Estados Unidos y Trinidad y Tobago con proyectos en más de 36 países y buscando siempre el desarrollo de proyectos en cualquier lugar del mundo. Nuestro principal fin  es apoyar  e impulsar el desarrollo sostenible de infraestructura para nuestros clientes, mediante el conocimiento, el profesionalismo de nuestro equipo, el rigor en nuestro trabajo y la ética de cada integrante en su actuar.

Nuestras personas son el fundamento diario que hoy nos permite consolidar alrededor de 60 años de historia, aportando al conocimiento técnico del sector de la ingeniería y al mejoramiento de la calidad de vida de nuestros colaboradores y de las comunidades beneficiadas.

Transparencia e integridad son los pilares sobre los cuales se basa nuestra organización.
